mapper.select: SELECT ismart_id AS "ismartId", user_nm AS "userNm", user_type AS "userType" FROM ems.user_bas

SELECT tgt_month AS "tgtMonth", max_power AS "maxPower", opt_power AS "optPower", delta_power AS "deltaPower" FROM ems.opt_peak WHERE cust_no = #{ismartId} AND anals_date = (SELECT MAX(anals_date) FROM ems.opt_peak WHERE cust_no = #{ismartId}) ORDER BY tgt_month::NUMERIC asc
